title: Cr3ator
author: Cr3ator
content: If you are looking for a verified binance account.PM me in telegram : @Cr3ator01

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Cr3ator on February 27, 2023, 04:56:20 AMIf you are looking for a verified binance account.PM me in telegram : @Cr3ator01No one should buy any account where there might have financial transactions. And when there is no restriction to open an account and verify then there is no reason to buy an account. Also, Binance does not allow to use of any VPN, and the account seller can recover the account. In this case, there will be two loss1. Lost funds for buying2. Lost deposit fund

comments.author: adamsandler55
comments.body: Quote from: Cr3ator on March 20, 2023, 01:29:22 AMBumpThis ain't 2018 dude. Your verified binance is worth about 25 cents lol

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: adamsandler55 on March 20, 2023, 03:05:33 AMQuote from: Cr3ator on March 20, 2023, 01:29:22 AMBumpThis ain't 2018 dude. Your verified binance is worth about 25 cents lol Op is trying to earn extra money by selling their Binance account through Op knows it is almost impossible and there is almost no chance to sell the account. Also, I doubt the fund will be safe. I think the fund will be stolen by the seller of the account. I have replied to the post of the OP but never got any response from op.
